DOC.brief_summary: Background : High prevalence fecal incontinence rectal resection patient rectal carcinoma . Hypothesis : Anorectal manometry do ileostomy sigmoidostomy closure predict fecal incontinence . Methods : Anorectal manometry , 1 month 6 month closure . Anorectal endosonography 1 month closure . Prediction postoperative incontinence surgeon ( digital sphincter examination ) . Visual analog scale continence , subjective success operation , global well ; Wexner Vaizey incontinence score ; Parks incontinence classification ; Rockwood fecal incontinence quality life score ; , 1 6 month closure .
DOC.brief_title: Value Anorectal Manometry Before Ileo- Sigmoidostomy Closure After Rectal Resection
DOC.criteria: patient plan ileo sigmoidostomy closure rectal resection rectal carcinoma preoperative incontinence solid stool dementia pregnancy latex allergy
